thread.title: Strictly's Darcey Bussell reveals if she thinks Craig Revel Horwood will become new head judge
thread.title_full: Strictly's Darcey Bussell reveals if she thinks Craig Revel Horwood will become new head judge

author: Halina Watts
title: Strictly's Darcey Bussell reveals if she thinks Craig Revel Horwood will become new head judge
text:
TV Strictly's Darcey Bussell reveals if she thinks Craig Revel Horwood will become new head judge Former ballerina says the contest will miss 'bossy' Len, who quit after the last series - and thinks they will announce the new judge at the same time as the contestants Share Darcy Bussell says Strictly will really miss head judge Len Goodman (Photo: PA) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Strictly’s Darcey Bussell doesn’t reckon Craig Revel Horwood will be new head judge – and she’s ­got the jitters about who will. 
She thinks Craig is too involved in ­helping produce the hit show to replace Len Goodman in the top job, she said to the Sunday People . 
And the former ballerina says the BBC dance contest will miss “bossy” Len, 72, who quit after the last series. 
Darcey , 47, said: “We don’t have any idea what will happen and I know they’re not going to tell us until the last minute. 
“It’s gone very quiet all of a sudden on the rumoured names front. I’m nervous – it’s a good nervous, not bad nerves – but, yeah, I’m getting excited. 
“Everyone is asking when it will be announced and I should think it will happen when they ­announce the celebrities.” 
She added: “Don’t you think I should have a say in this?” 
Talking about Len, who quit after a decade to focus on his family, she continued: “Strictly is going to really miss him. 
“He is incredibly clever, ­brilliant at what he does. He’s an institution. He has his own Len Goodman academy, totally ­successful at everything he does. It was a real pleasure to be with him.” Read More Former Ballerina thinks Craig Revel Horwood is too busy producing the show to take over as head judge (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
She played down 52-year-old Craig’s chances of replacing him. 
“I suppose maybe it would be Craig – but he’s a bit of a producer now. He produces a lot behind the scenes,” she says. 
“Bossiest judge was Len, but it was his job to be bossy and so he should have been – but I don’t know who would come in next. 
“I’ve known Craig the longest so I’m probably naturally closest to him. He’s choreographed a lot of work over the years and I have seen him doing that.” 
Darcey herself has even been tipped to take on the head judge role. 
And she says she’s getting fitter so she can wear some glamorous gowns when the show starts in September. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
